heading: Aspect of Retaliation â€“ Diablo 4 Druid Legendary Aspect
content: Aspect of Retaliation is a Druid Offensive Aspect that can be found by completing the Dungeon as well as from random enemy drops. After clearing the Dungeon for the first time the Aspect will be available in your Codex of Power. Legendary Aspects can change the way skills and builds work in significant ways.
